dmca.title: Realtor complains of infringing content in Google search
dmca.body:
DCMA NOTIFICATION
Copyright Infringement Report

Date: July 11, 2005 
 
Contact Information
Recipient Information:

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View, CA 94043

Sent via: Mail
 

Sender Information:

Your Company Attn: [private]
[private]
Valencia CA. 91384
Email: [private]@kw.com

(661)[private]
Fax (661)[private]
 
Google DMCA Rules (www.google.com/dmca.html)
Signature: [signature]
Delivery: Mail (Post)

To Whom It May Concern:
The following information is presented for the purposes of removing web content that infringes on our copyright per the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. We appreciate your enforcement of copyright law and support of our rights in this matter

Identification of Copyrighted Work
The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on www. JACKSON-CASS-HOMES.COM

Identification of Infringed Material
The following paragraphs, placed in quotes, were used as the search queries in Google. When a match was made to a site other than ours, we evaluated the extent of the copyright infringement. In all cases presented, entire paragraphs and/or pages have been copied. The attached spreadsheet provides examples of the copied text. We have retained but not submitted printed examples of each infringement.
 
DCMA NOTIFICATION
Copyright Infringement Report


Query# 1
"The decision to Buy a home is one of the most significant investments in life"

Query #2

"I'll double check the availability as unfortunately ... "

"many of these properties may already be in escrow!"

Query # 3

"It's quick and easy, Tell me what you are looking for and I'll find it for you!"


Query #4
"For most buyers the mortgage process is the most intense part of home buying"
The URLs of the infringing search results are as follows (With query numbers in parentheses):

Jackson-cass-homes.com
http://www.jackson-cass-homes.com/ (Query # 1 and Query # 2)

http://sevendw.reeceandnichols.com/AgentHome/Homepage.aspx (Query # 1 and Query # 2)

http://www.jackson-cass-homes.com/index.html (Query # 1 and Query # 2) http://www.jackson-cass-homes.com/ (Query # 3) http://www.jackson-cass-homes.com/index.html (Query # 4)

(328 matching words, almost My whole site !!! !!)
Copyright Owner Contact Information

[private](sic)
[private], Email [private]@kw.com

(661)[private]
 
DCMA NOTIFICATION
Copyright Infringement Report
Copyright Infringers Information

Registrant:
[private]
[private]
Harrisonville, Missouri 64701 United States

Registered through: GoDaddy.com
Domain Name: JACKSON-CASS-HOMES.COM Created on: 30-Oct-04
Expires on: 30-Oct-05
Last Updated on: 16-Jun-05

Administrative Contact:
[private]
[private]
Harrisonville, Missouri 64701 United States
[private]
Technical Contact:
[private] [private]
[private]
Harrisonville, Missouri 64701 United States
[private]

Domain servers in listed order:
N S 23A.AVAHOST. N ET NS23B.AVAHOST.NET 

Copyright Owners Statement
 
DCMA NOTIFICATION
Copyright Infringement Report


I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Signed on this day, the 11 day of July 2004, in the City, State, Country
[signature]	(c/s)
[private] REALTOR 
Keller Williams VIP Properties
